Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: my school does not show us previous responses to exams so no feedback is given, gen ai helps me to break down questions that I am unsure of but is not the most reliable for mathematics

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Makes me feel like spending my money on going to uni when they hide my quiz questions and answers is a waste of money as i am unable to learn from my mistakes when they are hidden
